ARTICLE.TITLE: Malaysian man shot dead in southern Thailand border town
ARTICLE.TEXT:
NARATHIWAT (Bernama): A Malaysian man was found dead with gunshot wounds to his head at Tak Bai on the Malaysia-Thailand border Tuesday (Aug 18).

Tak Bai district police chief Pol Colonel Suthawet Thareethai said the body of Mohd Ridzuan Ab Llah, 31 from Pasir Mas, Kelantan was found in Kg Tasik at Tak Bai, Narathiwat, southern Thailand at about 8.40pm (local time) Tuesday.

"The victim was believed to have been shot in his head. A preliminary investigation showed that the man has no record of entering Thailand, ” he said when contacted here Wednesday (Aug 19).

He said the police are also investigating the motive behind the incident.

The victim's body was taken to the Tok Baik Hospital for post-mortem and the police have also notified his next-of-kin. - Bernama
